segments.text: Mr . Carter has asked me to come over to invite you to the banquet held in your honor at the Shangri-La Hotel at 7:00 this evening . Here's an invitation for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How nice of him . I'll be delighted to go . But what time would be convenient ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you could be ready by , say 6:30 o'clock , I'll be at the hotel to pick you up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . It's most thoughtful of you to do this , Miss Rose .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . Well , then . I'll say goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodbye and see you tonight . Miss Rose .
segments.speaker: S2
